items.name: id
items.info: id of the coincidence hit

items.name: sector
items.info: sector of BAND

items.name: layer
items.info: layer or column id of BAND

items.name: component
items.info: paddle or bad id of BAND

items.name: meantimeTdc
items.info: Calibrated meantime of L and R on a bar (ns) from TDC

items.name: meantimeFadc
items.info: Calibrated meantime of L and R on a bar (ns) from FADC

items.name: difftimeTdc
items.info: Calibrated time difference of L and R on a bar(ns) from TDC

items.name: difftimeFadc
items.info: Calibrated time difference of L and R on a bar(ns) from FADC

items.name: adcLcorr
items.info: Calibrated ADC of left PMT of coincidence hit

items.name: adcRcorr
items.info: Calibrated ADC of right PMT of coincidence hit

items.name: tFadcLcorr
items.info: Calibrated time from FADC of left PMT in ns of coincidence hit

items.name: tFadcRcorr
items.info: Calibrated time from FADC of right PMT in ns of coincidence hit

items.name: tTdcLcorr
items.info: Calibrated time from TDC of left PMT in ns of coincidence hit

items.name: tTdcRcorr
items.info: Calibrated time from TDC of right PMT in ns of coincidence hit

items.name: x
items.info: X coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: y
items.info: Y coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: z
items.info: Z coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: ux
